name: Moccu
description:
As a creative digital agency, Moccu accompanies and advises leading brands and companies to master the challenges of digital change and make use of the possibilities of digitization for their own value creation.Â 
Moccu develops digital products and solutions that simplify the everyday life of people and make them richer; Moccu creates value-added campaigns and branded content, helps to achieve visibility and reach, and consistently aligns user needs and brand perspective.
